title: The Adventures of Jake and the Giant Water Tower
description: Jake was a happy little boy who loved to ride in his Gigi's car. He also loved Water Towers--the bigger the better! Then, one day while out riding he saw something terrible about to happen on a Water Tower. His swift action made him a hero. This book has recently won a prestigious Northern Lights Book Award. According to the judges, out of hundreds of outstanding entries from around the world, this book stood out. The judges are confident that it will stand the test of time and children will be enjoying Jake and the Giant Water Tower for generations to come.
author: Ron Sobel
